Title: Du bei dao wang
Actors: Jimmy Wang Yu, Chiao Chiao, Chia Essie Lin, Feng Tien
Plot: After defeating The Long-Armed Devil and his armies, our nubbed hero has been living in retirement as a farmer, but circumstances causes him to come out of retirement and take on The Eight Kings, each warrior with their own unique fighting style. The time has come for the one armed swordsman to return.
